eegdash.dataset.DS006519
========================

Dataset of intracranial EEG during cortical stimulations evoking negative motor responses (OpenNeuro ``ds006519``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: ieeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 21` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 35` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

     - Dataset of intracranial EEG during cortical stimulations evoking negative motor responses
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Andrei Barborica, Cristina Ghita, Laurentiu Tofan, Irina Oane, Ioana Mindruta

     - `doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds006519.v1.0.0 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds006519.v1.0.0>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds006519>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds006519>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS006519

   dataset = DS006519(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS006519(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS006519(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
